$HYPE is accelerating, eyes on $50

Hyperliquid has surged over 40% past $30, fueled by Kraken listing rumors and strong performance in HIP-3 markets, despite sell pressure from large holders.

As social activity accelerates higher, we scanned the latest 23,000 social mentions of $HYPE to uncover what they community is excited about...

40% Mindshare
Positive Price Action and Momentum
Hyperliquid is experiencing significant positive price movement, with a 24-hour increase of 22.44% and a 7-day increase of 19.61%. Social posts highlight this momentum, with users noting breakouts, bullish reversals, and price targets like $28 and $50.

30% Mindshare
Airdrop Speculation and User Engagement
There is strong speculation about an upcoming Hyperliquid airdrop, driving user engagement and activity on the platform. Many posts discuss strategies for maximizing airdrop rewards, such as buying and staking HYPE, trading, and participating in various platform activities.

20% Mindshare
Platform Growth and Utility
Users are discussing Hyperliquid's expanding utility, including its role as a decentralized exchange for perps, equities, and commodities, and its growing ecosystem. Mentions of HIP-3, on-chain earn features, and comparisons to other DEXs highlight its perceived value and potential.

Have the $HYPE sellers gone?

As per onchain signals and analysts including @Ericonomic and @Henrik_on_HL, the bulk of the HYPE sell pressure is now gone or nearing exhaustion.

1. Tornado Cash-linked whale cluster

This cluster began dumping millions of HYPE in early January, but the bulk of the selling appears to have finished on Jan 27‚Äì28.

2. Similar large entities

Other big sellers including Continue Fund also look to have finished their exits by Jan 27‚Äì28.

3. Team unlocks 

This was a key factor in the earlier price weakness, but now seems to have been largely absorbed and priced in by the market.

With HIP-3 permissionless markets booming, more CEX listings coming,  and Hyperliquid leading on-chain perps, it could be clear skies above for HYPE.

‚ÄúAs we stated during the launch of Asset Hub, our goal is to list every asset that meets our legal, compliance, and technical security standards. These standards do not take into account a project's market capitalization or popularity.‚Äù

$HYPE won the poll, so here we go with a deep dive.


On the high time frame, something has now changed.


As you can see, those ranges are very telling.


Originally, we had an accumulation range, hunted for liquidity, manipulated below, and broke above. Followed by a long uptrend. Action>Reaction.


When we formed the top, same playbook, but inverted. The range resolved in distribution. Followed by a long downtrend. Action>Reaction.


Now?


We hunted the 10/10 wick, and the range resolved in accumulation. Manipulation below, broke to the upside.


If we should get the action>reaction, we should therefore expect an uptrend now.


Market structure? Confirm this thesis; broken bullish for the first time in months.


What does it mean?


The mental approach should change, favoring longs for swing trades, short trades only for scalps.


Positioning-wise, I am not interested in chasing an impulsive move, so will probably sit on my hands waiting for a correction; corrections always happen.


So the first interest is to monitor a LTF sign of weakness for a scalp short. The usual, MSB or ranges breaking down. Nice FVG to be filled on the way down.


Once the high will be printed, I will be able to make a plan for a swing long.


Remember, the money is made in the waiting.

Hyperliquid has reduced monthly team token unlocks for $HYPE by roughly 90%, lowering the amount from about 1.2 million tokens in January to approximately 140,000 tokens beginning in February, per a team update shared on Discord.

The adjustment coincides with a sharp move in $HYPE‚Äôs market price over the past week and comes as liquidity on Hyperliquid continues to expand, with onchain data showing deeper order books across major trading pairs.

The next scheduled team token distribution is set for February 6, with the revised unlock amount reflected in updated token supply schedules.
